alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 22 at 11:22PM PST until November 23 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. In Washington, Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The dense fog is currently mainly along Oregon Highway 11 northeast through the Walla Walla area.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington
